doc:
Richard Bennett (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Bennett_(actor) 0 Clarence Charles William Henry Richard Bennett (May 21, 1870 – October 22, 1944) was an American actor who became a stage and silent screen actor over the early decades of the 20th century. He was the father of actresses Constance Bennett, Barbara Bennett and Joan Bennett with actress Adrienne Morrison, his second wife. Clarence_Charles_William_Henry_Richard_Bennett ( May_21_,_1870 – October_22_,_1944 ) was an_American_actor who became a_stage and silent_screen_actor over the_early_decades of the_20th_century . He was the_father of actresses_Constance_Bennett , Barbara_Bennett_and_Joan_Bennett with actress_Adrienne_Morrison , his_second_wife .
